import Input from './input' import Countdown, { zeroPad } from 'react-countdown' export default function Vault({ contract, token, balance }) { const handleApprove = async () => { console.log(contract) } const handleDeposit = async () => { const transactionParameters = { to: contract.address, from: window.ethereum.selectedAddress, data: '0x7f7465737432000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000600057', } window.ethereum.request({ method: 'eth_sendTransaction', params: [transactionParameters], }) } return (

Yield Guild Prize Pool

(

{zeroPad(props.days)}

DAY

{zeroPad(props.hours)}

HR

{zeroPad(props.minutes)}

MIN

{zeroPad(props.seconds)}

SEC

)} />
) }
